name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: AI ChatBot Developer
professional_summary: Utilized Microsoft Bot Framework and Google Cloud Contact Center AI (CCAI) to develop intelligent chatbot solutions, ensuring natural and engaging conversational experiences.
Integrated natural language processing (NLP) and generative AI models to enhance chatbot interactions, focusing on effective prompt engineering.
Modernized On-Prem SharePoint applications to M365, improving collaboration and efficiency across teams.
Designed and deployed secure APIs for data access, ensuring seamless integration with chatbot systems and other software applications.
Implemented conversational interfaces using Microsoft ecosystem tools, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.
Supported the migration of existing SharePoint On-Prem systems to M365, ensuring data integrity and system stability.
Developed generative AI solutions to improve customer experience and worker efficiency, leveraging Google CCAI Services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align AI solutions with business objectives, ensuring innovative and impactful outcomes.
Ensured HIPAA compliance in healthcare-related chatbot solutions, maintaining data security and privacy standards.
Troubleshot and debugged chatbot systems, resolving issues to maintain high performance and reliability.
Conducted code reviews and participated in team meetings to ensure high-quality AI solution development.
Applied machine learning models to enhance chatbot intelligence, improving response accuracy and user satisfaction.
Integrated chatbot systems with external software applications, enabling seamless data flow and functionality.
Utilized Azure and GCP cloud platforms to deploy and manage AI solutions, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Implemented effective prompt engineering techniques to optimize chatbot responses, making interactions more intuitive.
Worked with REST APIs to facilitate data exchange between chatbot systems and backend services.
Contributed to the development of M365 applications, enhancing productivity and user experience.
Focused on creating AI solutions that improve customer experience and worker efficiency, driving business value.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
